Pipeline Details

With this feature you will be able to give access to this Pipeline to other members of FlowChat.

More about Permissions

What they can do:
  • See and edit all the leads in this pipeline
  • Move leads to other pipeline stages
  • Use only the assigned message template when clicking on the profile or chat button
What they cannot do:
  • Delete leads from your account
  • Delete this pipeline or any pipeline stages in it
  • See or edit message templates in the pipeline

                              Settings

                              With this feature you will be able to give access to this Pipeline to other members.

                              More about Permissions

                              What they can do:
                              • See and edit all the leads in this pipeline
                              • Move leads to other pipeline stages
                              • Use only the assigned message template when clicking on the profile or chat button
                              What they cannot do:
                              • Delete leads from your account
                              • Delete this pipeline or any pipeline stages in it
                              • See or edit message templates in the pipeline

                              Run Automation
                              Heads up! Before you dive in:

                              This feature lets you automate actions for the leads your selected. Adjust your settings to pick your comfort level of risk.

                              While automated actions mimic manual ones, overdoing it might get you restricted by the social platform. We don't suggest any specific settings as "safe".

                              Remember, the social platform doesn't differentiate between manual and automated actions or messages; it treats them all the same.

                              It's important to note that limitations actions or messages process by this feature don't consider any other actions or sent messages manually on the social platform. It treats all these actions and messages the same way.
